message: Thank you again for attending [Title of Webinar]. We're pleased to inform you that you can now download your certificate(s). You can review and download your CLE certificates at any time from the Justia CLE Dashboard.
message3: If you have any questions about your CLE certificate, please contact Justia Support.
Thank you for participating, and we look forward to seeing you at future Justia CLE Webinars!
disclaimer: * Please review the information included in your certificate download and visit individual webinar pages for more information about CLE accreditation and reporting.
